short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipper Note is a simple notepad with functionalities of taking notes, saving clipped content and download them in Markdown Format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple notepad and clipboard extension that save content in Markdown format for Google Chrome. 

Capture any Text, Images even whole pages you want from websites.

Record any idea or inspiration that come to your mind when you broswe the site.

FEATURES:

Note Taking

--- Take notes and organize them in markdown style.

--- Preview the contents  in markdown format.

Clipboard

--- Capture whole page of the contents.

--- Manually select part of the content ( text or images ) that attracted from website.

Storage

--- Contents will be saved in your chrome until you delete them.

--- Download them to local. 





SOME HINT:

1. When you want to try this extension the first time on pages that already opened before the extension installed, a refresh of the page can be helpful.
2. Like many other extension, this extension cannot be used in Chrome Web Store.
